title: Help with Egyptian font
content:
Anyone have any suggestions for a “breezy”/contemporary Egyptian typeface that would be a good match for the sans-serif Flama:

[http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page\_id=10](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015211333/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=10 "http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page\_id=10")

The Egyptian would be used for display type in a newspaper, and would ideally have several available weights.

Thanks!!

 [‹ Serif to Complement Fling?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015211333/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46326 "Go to previous forum topic") [Suggestions for 'status' typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015211333/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46320 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tnoels22

comments.content:
What about Bodoni Egyptian? Farao would provide a bit more contrast with Flama, though.

—  
Nick Hladek
